teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Green Knight Society
teams.loan_because: We believe that a helping hand is far superior to a hand-out.

teams.name: Congregation Hakafa
teams.loan_because: Our encirclement includes our collective responsibility to empower others around the world.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: Sunisthefuture
teams.loan_because: We want to spread more sunshine throughout the planet earth by increasing opportunities that would make this planet earth a better place to live. This is accomplished via micro-finance. With as little as $25, any one is able to participate in helping another entrepreneur on planet Earth.
teams.description:
We are hopeful and optimistic that sun, water, wind, and geothermal energy will lead us into a world free from pollution and war.  Let us earthlings look for ways to make this a reality! Sunisthefuture Team supports entrepreneurs from USA and various developing nations in starting/maintaining businesses in solar energy/renewable energy/recycling/energy efficiency. 

Click on "Loans" and "Members" above to see which small businesses we've supported and who are members on Sunisthefuture Team at Kiva.

To see what Green Loans are currently needing help to be funded, click on "Lend" on top of the page, then select (placing a check mark inside the box next to...) for "Green" under ATTRIBUTES in the left hand margin.  At the end of the transaction, be sure to click on "complete order" in order to complete the transaction. Then check to see if the number of loans has been correctly added for your individual profile and for the team you've attributed the loan to. 

For better understanding of :
1. how Kiva works: http://www.kiva.org/about/how

2. how micro-finance works: http://www.kiva.org/about/microfinance 

3. List of Kiva Field Partners: http://www.kiva.org/partners

4. How to become a Field Partner at Kiva: http://www.kiva.org/partners/info 

5. Risk and Due Diligence: http://www.kiva.org/about/risk

To thank you all for your participation at Sunisthefuture Team at Kiva, I've prepared lots of posts and videos on solar energy for your perusal at http://www.sunisthefuture.net and sunisthefuture Youtube Channel at http://www.youtube.com/user/sunisthefuture

Encourage your friends, family, twitter or Facebook audience to join us.

If you should have any questions/concerns/suggestions, please feel free to contact me via message system within Kiva or email me directly at sunisthefuture@gmail.com  

~have a bright and sunny day~
sunisthefuture

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.description: Khomota Kiva is an association dedicated to promoting the empowerment of the impoverished through effective microfinancing techniques. teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the lives of those in need.
teams.description: We are a team of Twin Cities residents concerned about world poverty. We host events around the city to raise money for Kiva loans, which we use to make new loans once the money is returned. We hope, as a community, to improve the plight of the impoverished by using microlending.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Nerds for Entrepreneurs
teams.loan_because: We're nerds who make money and like to share the wealth
teams.description: As the group name suggests, this is group is for anyone who makes a living as a nerd and wants to help others! Come join us, geek!

teams.name: Rare Country Availability Alerts
teams.loan_because:
Please post a message to the group if you see any of the following countries:
Belize
Botswana
Brazil
Cote D'Ivorie
Malawi
Mauritania
Moldova
Namibia
Nepal
Nigeria
Panama
Papua, New Guinea
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
Singapore
South Africa
Suriname
Thailand
Turkey
Vanuatu
If you are still in search of a country not list above, please private message one of the admins with the name of it and it will be added to this list. Please PM to avoid sending out emails about anything other than country availability alerts :-)
teams.description: A group JUST to announce the availability of rare or new countries.  (If you want to also collect field partners, activities or have conversations about collecting, please join the group Crazy Country Collectors).

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Entrepreneurs & Business Owners
teams.loan_because: We have a passion for seeing other people succeed and helping them to achieve total freedom and success in business.
teams.description: We are a group of entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders who take action to change our life and the life of others.

teams.name: Business Owners & Entrepreneurs Worldwide
teams.loan_because: As business owners we loan to empower others to follow the same path we have in situations more challenging than ours. Sustainable local economies address poverty issues at their base. We are inspired by the strength of the human spirit of the people we have the privilege to lend to here. They lead their communities into a better economy and lift themselves and others out of poverty. This strength in such adverse conditions is something we stand in awe of. We are humbled by it.
teams.description:
One of the team captains will give a $25 loan for each person that joins each month. 

Whether you join as a business owner or a Non-business owner looking to multiply your loans through challenges, welcome.

Business Owners & Entrepreneurs. We know what it takes to start and grow businesses. We know the importance of access to capital and we are here to help others follow the same challenging and rewarding path we have followed.

teams.name: The Paleo Community
teams.loan_because: Everyone needs the chance to have a better life and better health.
teams.description: We believe that eating simply and close to the earth is the best way to health:  meat, vegetables, and natural fat; not overprocessed and unnatural foods.

teams.name: Snow
teams.loan_because: We care

teams.name: Sister Helping Sisters
teams.loan_because: Lift up women to lift the world, because we can.
teams.description: Women joining together to help women everywhere become more independent.

teams.name: Team Sheppard
teams.loan_because: We love.
teams.description: Caring families.

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: London
teams.loan_because:
Looking for Team members who want to become more involved in promoting the team and expanding our membership. Contact Richard to join the leadership. 

If each team member posted a link to this team on their favourite social media site we should see a spike in membership.. 520 as at 15th March 2013

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

abaca              www.kiva.org/lend/479304 
bees and beehives   www.kiva.org/lend/416522 
bicycle repair   www.kiva.org/lend/422950 
bicycle sales   www.kiva.org/lend/434305
biodigesters www.kiva.org/lend/486001  
bus transportation   www.kiva.org/lend/441833
eco-friendly products   www.kiva.org/lend/369833 
electric vehicles    www.kiva.org/lend/475485
electronics repair   www.kiva.org/lend/451383
energy efficient products   www.kiva.org/lend/431717
Fair Trade (sustainably grown) coffee  www.kiva.org/lend/459274  
farm tools & equipment   www.kiva.org/lend/405404 
flowers   www.kiva.org/lend/355897 
fuel-efficient cookstoves www.kiva.org/lend/533728 
insulation   www.kiva.org/lend/422895 
manure & other natural fertilizers   www.kiva.org/lend/425938
natural medicines from native plants     www.kiva.org/lend/484068 
nipa roofing businesses www.kiva.org/lend/793052
organic farms or gardens   www.kiva.org/lend/389681 
organic food www.kiva.org/lend/489520
organic seeds   www.kiva.org/lend/431157 
recycling   www.kiva.org/lend/443724 
recycling tools   www.kiva.org/lend/419761
sanitation www.kiva.org/lend/475282 
scrap metal   www.kiva.org/lend/405683 
scrap wood   www.kiva.org/lend/476241
shoe repair   www.kiva.org/lend/413675 
solar lanterns or lamps   www.kiva.org/lend/451508
solar lighting kits (distribution)   www.kiva.org/lend/426323
solar panels (leasing)   www.kiva.org/lend/426140
solar panels (home or business installations)   www.kiva.org/lend/358310
spare parts (bicycles)   www.kiva.org/lend/422456
spare parts (other)   www.kiva.org/lend/421554 
tailoring   www.kiva.org/lend/398446 
tree seedlings   www.kiva.org/lend/424330 
used clothing   www.kiva.org/lend/424287
used furniture   www.kiva.org/lend/464084 
used shoes   www.kiva.org/lend/449579
water tanks   www.kiva.org/lend/523269
